titles.title: An authentic vacation in the midst of Ukrainian color!

slider.text: Polonyny Carpathians, in the village of Oriv in the middle of the mountains there is a cozy corner for unforgettable experiences. Real Ukrainian mountains, homemade cheese-making on polony, waterfalls and ancient trees are waiting for you.

relax.text: Active recreation in unusual locations. Pristine nature and local flavor will give you unforgettable impressions.

about.title: About us
about.image text: Rest, emotions, impressions, atypical routes, incredible locations - this is all about rural eco-tourism in Ukraine
about.text:
Our team has collected the most colorful places of our country just for you.

The mission of our company is to give unforgettable impressions and show Ukraine from a different side. Walk with you along the forest paths to eat fresh Carpathian cheese. Dive into the canyon and see the village of Bakota submerged under the layer of years. Take a ride on the gondolas in the 'Ukrainian Venice'.

Explore Ukraine together!

bakota.title: Unexplored Bakota
bakota.text: In the Khmelnytskyi region, there is a lost land - Bakota. A picturesque canyon with an ancient history fascinates with its spaciousness and unusual atmosphere. Beekeeping, fresh honey from wild herbs, touch with nature.

carpathians.title: Polonyny of the Carpathians
carpathians.text: Polonyny Carpathians, in the village of Oriv in the middle of the mountains there is a cozy corner for unforgettable experiences. Real Ukrainian mountains, homemade cheese-making on polony, waterfalls and ancient trees are waiting for you.

kyiv.title: Authentic Kyiv region
kyiv.text: An authentic Ukrainian village was located near the center of Kyiv on the territory of the village of the same name, Pyrogovo. Wooden mills, fragrant bread prepared with your own hands, Ukrainian songs and much more await you right now.

odessa.title: Atypical Odesa
odessa.text: The picturesque town of Vylkovo is located in Odesa region. It is also called 'Ukrainian Venice'. Vylkovo is a town on the water, surrounded by canals. Located in the place where the Danube River and the Black Sea meet. People move mainly by boats. An atypical Ukrainian village will not leave you without impressions.
